job_history.work_description: Supervise the media finance, production, client finance, accounts payable and accounts receivable departments. Manage the monthly accounting close and consolidation of monthly reports. Prepare monthly financial statements (Balance Sheet, P&L, Cash Flow) & variance analysis for the company.
Manage the billing function for the West region. Prepare and provide weekly revenue trending analysis to account teams. Prepare monthly staff utilization/projections reports to senior account leads.
Validated and approved forecast rate assumptions provided by global procurement team. Prepared weekly market commodity report. Validated market rates used by manufacturing plants.

Performed revenue analysis, cost analysis, and utilization analysis on a monthly basis and provide reports to Finance Director and CFO. Analyzed financial results against the forecast and prior year results to measure current performance.

education.domain: Corporate Finance & Advertising and Promotion Strategy

skills.name: Financial Analysis
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience performing financial analysis, including revenue analysis, cost analysis, and utilization analysis, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Financial Reporting
skills.explanation: Has prepared various financial reports, including monthly financial statements, variance analysis, and weekly revenue trending analysis, showing expert-level proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Planning
skills.explanation: Has experience with forecast rate assumptions, market commodity reports, and financial forecasting, suggesting strong proficiency in financial planning.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has supervised various finance departments, including media finance, production, client finance, accounts payable, and accounts receivable, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Auditing
skills.explanation: Has a Master's degree in Auditing & Fraud Examination, but limited work experience in auditing, showing a solid working proficiency.

skills.name: Financial Management
skills.explanation: Has managed the monthly accounting close and consolidation of monthly reports, and has experience with financial management, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Data Analysis
skills.explanation: Has performed data analysis on financial results, including revenue analysis, cost analysis, and utilization analysis, suggesting strong proficiency in data analysis.
